## Surface Pro

A collection of Microsoft's Surface Pro Themes for Windows 10 and 11.

![Preview](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/836bd001-fc1e-41ac-8fce-917bee5d1f0e/djn7cxc-e49443d2-5392-46e6-88f2-8ed6fdc83d61.png/v1/fill/w_1131,h_707,q_70,strp/microsoft_surface_pro_by_og_nimbi_djn7cxc-pre.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..zy40lWi0MBSagfhR9Fdhc0gB_MoykunA-21koI327UA)

### Features

- Custom Cursors
- Supports 4k Resolutions

### Instructions

- Download and extract the archive via the download button below.
- Copy the contents of the `Themes` folder into `%LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\Themes\`
- Apply the theme via `Settings > Personalization > Themes`

[![Download](https://img.shields.io/badge/Download-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=gitlab&logoColor=white&logoSize=auto&labelColor=red&color=black&cacheSeconds=3600)](https://gitlab.com/the-back-room/deskthemepacks/sfw/surface-pro/-/archive/main/surface-pro-main.zip)
